metadata.name: 서울바운드 Crew
metadata.description: The Crew Pass is owned by SeoulBound crews who volunteered and contributed to make the entire journey fun and meaningful.
metadata.criteria:
To become a crew member of SeoulBound, please contact our crew on Twitter @seoul_bound. 

Crew Passes will be granted to core volunteers, operators, and facilitators who have committed their time and resources to help make SeoulBound a fun and caring community. As a crew member, you will have opportunities to work closely with the SeoulBound team that values teamwork, creativity, and inclusivity.
metadata.evidence: The winner of this badge is an authorized crew member of SeoulBound 2023 and an ecosystem contributor in the DAO space who has made significant contributions to bring the gathering to life.
